Package org.pepstock.charba.client.ml

Class BaseLinearRegression<T extends NativeBaseLinearRegression>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.BaseRegression<T>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.BaseLinearRegression<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsRegression
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearRegression, TheilSenRegression
    abstract class BaseLinearRegression<T extends NativeBaseLinearRegression>
extends BaseRegression<T>
    Abstract class to map all the linear regressions.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
